java.lang.Object

java.awt.Frame

it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.view.userinterface.GUinterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class GUinterface
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements UserInterface
Class for the GUI interface of the game
